synopsis: In the gripping, mind-bending saga of Project Echo, trailblazing scientist Dr. Evelyn Porter is plunged into a digital purgatory, where she uncovers the chilling secret behind humanity's ambitious endeavor to digitize consciousness and must confront an enigmatic adversary that threatens not only her existence but the lives of everyone connected to the project. As Evelyn navigates this perilous realm with spectral allies, they strive to save those ensnared in the treacherous labyrinth, while unraveling the haunting mystery at the heart of Project Echo. A thought-provoking exploration of memory, identity, and the boundaries between life and death, this captivating journey delves deep into the ethics and implications of technology's relentless march forward.
